name: birthday_celebration
description: Fun birthday party morphs with cake and celebrations
author: StarStitch

global_scene.location_prompt: birthday party setting, colorful balloons, confetti, birthday cake with candles, festive decorations, happy atmosphere, 4k
global_scene.negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, cartoon, low quality, sad, dark

sequence.name: Birthday Person
sequence.visual_prompt: Happy person wearing party hat, excited expression, standing near cake

sequence.name: Grown Up
sequence.visual_prompt: Same person as adult, sophisticated, blowing out candles
